items.title: June GNU Spotlight with Amin Bandali featuring Sixteen new GNU releases: GNUnet, Nettle, and more!

items.title: Call for volunteers: Help us with the GNU Press shop
items.content:
<article>People around the world are eagerly waiting to receive their GNU Press 
shop orders, and we need a little help sending everything out. Would 
you be willing to donate a little of your time to support the FSF's 
work while chatting and enjoying snacks with other free software 
supporters? </article>

items.title: Reverse engineering, DDoS attacks, and why we need your voice. Read more in the spring Bulletin
621: The Sunday Secret Sauce
items.author: Jupiter Broadcasting
items.content: We're highlighting several stories and reviews that never made it into the show. From GrapheneOS trouble, Asahi updates, Framework's desktop reveal, Starlink's Linux magic, and more.
